SEARCH
Package org.example.entity

Class AppointmentOutcomeRecord

java.lang.Object
org.example.entity.AppointmentOutcomeRecord
public class AppointmentOutcomeRecord extends Object
Represents an appointment outcome record, including details about the appointment ID, date, consultation notes, types of services provided, and prescriptions issued during the appointment.

      date - the date of the appointment
      consultationNotes - the consultation notes of the appointment
      typeOfService - the list of types of services provided during the appointment
      prescriptions - the list of prescriptions given during the appointment
